creator: batrakov@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 21617
word file with embedded doc and excel documents

There no support of embedded documents in word.
This feature reques came from discussion in user@poi.apache.org on Mon, 03 Mar 2008 15:58:42 GMT
Sample file is in attachment

creator: batrakov@gmail.com
text:
I've changed the issue to request support for all documents (HSSF, HWPF, HSLF, HDGF).
Also i attach sample documents of other format.

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text:
Thanks for these files, I've put them in svn so we have them available to test with

May be a little while until we get a chance to use them though :/
3.1 beta 1 included support and documentation on working with embeded files
